content.en: Dynamic Bandwidth Allocation: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms to effectively allocate bandwidth in Ethernet PONs (Passive Optical Networks). These algorithms, such as the Multipoint Control Protocol, D-CRED algorithm, and Hierarchical dynamic bandwidth allocation algorithm, aim to achieve higher utilization, lower queuing delay, and support quality of service in EPONs. Other algorithms, like the Joint bandwidth scheduling algorithm and Two-phase cycle DBA algorithm, focus on supporting differentiated services and multiple service providers in EPONs. These advancements in dynamic bandwidth allocation algorithms are crucial for improving the performance and scalability of EPON networks.
content.da: Dynamisk Båndbreddeallokering: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for effektivt at allokere båndbredde i Ethernet PONs (Passive Optical Networks). Disse algoritmer, såsom Multipoint Control Protocol, D-CRED algoritmen og Hierarchical dynamisk båndbreddeallokeringsalgoritmen, sigter mod at opnå højere udnyttelse, lavere køforsinkelse og understøtte kvalitet af service i EPONs. Andre algoritmer, som Joint båndbreddetildelingsalgoritmen og Two-phase cycle DBA algoritmen, fokuserer på at understøtte differentierede tjenester og flere tjenesteudbydere i EPONs. Disse fremskridt inden for dynamiske båndbreddeallokering algoritmer er afgørende for at forbedre ydeevnen og skalerbarheden af EPON-netværk.
